SAM Simulation Core (SSC)

BatteryPower Struct Reference

The BatteryPower structure contains all of the power flow components for a battery simulation The structure also contains information about the single point efficiecies required to convert power from one form to another Power quantities in BatteryPower are either all AC or all DC depending on which part of the controller is looking at it. More...

 A boolean specifying whether the battery is allowed to discharge in the timestep.

 The maximum sustained current for charging [A].

 A numerical tolerance. Below this value, zero out the power flow.
 

Detailed Description

The BatteryPower structure contains all of the power flow components for a battery simulation The structure also contains information about the single point efficiecies required to convert power from one form to another Power quantities in BatteryPower are either all AC or all DC depending on which part of the controller is looking at it.
